title: 92/472/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 September 1992 amending Decision 91/146/EEC concerning protective measures against cholera in Peru
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 14 September 1992  amending Decision 91/146/EEC concerning protective measures against cholera in Peru  (92/472/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 2 of Decision 91/146/EEC the following point 3 is added:
'3. to consignments of scallops (Argopecten purpuratus) produced by Mariexport SA and accompanied, along with the official certificate referred to in point 1, by a Cerper attestation certifying:
(a) that the production area of the scallops meets the conditions laid down in the Annex, Chapter 1, point 1 (a) to Directive 91/492/EEC;
(b) that the public health controls and the monitoring of production are carried out by Cerper and the Imarpe (Instituto del mar del Perú), in accordance with Chapter VI of the Annex to Directive 91/492/EEC.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 September 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
